summary: The Caldwell family returns. With everyone coming home and no school restrictions, Oliver takes the oppurtunity to suprise the family with a vacation to Puerto Rico.
cast: Gregory Harrison|Heidi Lenhart|Katie Volding|Jake Dinwiddie|Kathleen Mealia|Ciaran Tyrrell|Olga Merediz|Bradley White|Gerrit Graham|Jessenia Da Silva|Brian Tester|Antonio Torres|Rafael Alvarez|Bettina Mercado|Les Mau|Keila Michelle
title: Au pair 3 Aventuras en el paraíso
